## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (ccadddda2e378ac369f6216642e81ca634a98edb6271389cffb3672c004c1f4c)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'grafana-metricsdrilldown-app' @ 2.4.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
